path.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

line.style: fill: #fff; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

rect.style: fill: none; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
